titlePage.docTitle:
The Change in the Pref actor Exponent with Valence
for Percolation in 3 and 4 Dimensions
Imperial College,
Prince Consort Road, London SW 7 U.K.
titlePage.byline:
Solid State Group-Physics Department, Imperial College,
, Prince Consort Road, London SW 7 U.K.

Metabolic Unit, Hunts House, Guy's Hospital, Medical School,
, London SEI, U.K.

front.div:
The change of the prefactor exponent for restricted valence percolation in 3 and 4 dimensions
is shown to occur between valences 2 and 3 as in 2 dimensions. For valence 2 the exponent is
SAW-like and after the change it assumes the normal peroolative value for each dimension.
One of the specializations of percolation in recent
